description:
She`s one of Karyuusai Brand`s greatest automatons, the Snow in their Setsugetsuka Series. Her magic circuit Himokagami steals heat from around the target, creating a huge pillar of ice and freezing the very air. She`s the greatest of her sisters in simple offensive power and area control. She`s Yaya`s older sister, and she often scolds her.
Source: ANN
name: Irori
